text: Eurymerodesmidae is a family of flat-backed millipedes in the order Polydesmida. There are at least 2 genera and 30 described species in Eurymerodesmidae. ==Genera== * Eurymerodesmus Brolemann, 1900 * Paresmus ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Polydesmida Category:Millipede families
title: Eurymerodesmidae
